org.grouplens.lenskit.inject

Class RecommenderInstantiator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.inject.RecommenderInstantiator

  • public final class RecommenderInstantiator
extends Object

    Process a recommender graph to deal with its shareable nodes.

    Since:
    1.2
    Compatibility
    Experimental

      • getGraph

        public DAGNode<Component,Dependency> getGraph()

        Get the graph from this instantiator.

        Returns:
        The graph. This method returns a defensive copy, so modifying it will not modify the graph underlying this instantiator.

      • instantiate

        public DAGNode<Component,Dependency> instantiate()
                                          throws RecommenderBuildException

        Instantiate the recommender graph. This requires the graph to have been resolved with a real DAO instance, not just a class, if anything references the DAO. Use LenskitConfiguration.buildGraph() to get such a graph.

        Returns:
        A new recommender graph with all shareable nodes pre-instantiated.
        Throws:
        RecommenderBuildException - If there is an error instantiating the graph.

      • simulate

        public DAGNode<Component,Dependency> simulate()
                                       throws RecommenderBuildException

        Simulate instantiating a graph.

        Returns:
        The simulated graph.
        Throws:
        RecommenderBuildException
